"The Play Navigator":
"The Play Navigator is a system that gives you tips on how to improve your Power Level.

You will be given a variety of hints about how to get stronger, based on your current Power Level and Main Task progression."

"Once you have selected a Play Goal, Guide Information telling you how to complete that goal will be displayed, and a marker will direct you to relevant locations, such as Ryuker Devices in locations suitable for levelling up, or Trainia where you can obtain Skill Points."
